generated:
**Weekly Meal Plan for Weight Loss (Nut-Free)**

**Day 1:**
- **Breakfast:** Greek Yogurt Parfait
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 1 cup Greek yogurt
    - 1/2 cup mixed berries
    - 1 tbsp chia seeds
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 250
    - Carbohydrates: 30g
    - Fats: 7g
    - Proteins: 18g
    - Fiber: 8g
- **Lunch:** Grilled Chicken Salad
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 4 oz grilled chicken breast
    - 2 cups mixed greens
    - 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes
    - 1/2 cup cucumbers
    - 2 tbsp vinaigrette dressing
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 350
    - Carbohydrates: 15g
    - Fats: 12g
    - Proteins: 40g
    - Fiber: 5g
- **Dinner:** Baked Salmon with Roasted Vegetables and Quinoa
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 4 oz salmon fillet
    - 1 cup mixed roasted vegetables (bell peppers, zucchini, carrots)
    - 1/2 cup cooked quinoa
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 400
    - Carbohydrates: 30g
    - Fats: 20g
    - Proteins: 30g
    - Fiber: 6g
- **Snack:** Apple slices with 1 tbsp almond butter
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 150
    - Carbohydrates: 20g
    - Fats: 7g
    - Proteins: 3g
    - Fiber: 5g

**Day 2:**
- **Breakfast:** Scrambled Eggs with Spinach and Tomatoes
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 2 eggs
    - 1 cup fresh spinach
    - 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes
    - 2 slices whole grain toast
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 300
    - Carbohydrates: 25g
    - Fats: 14g
    - Proteins: 18g
    - Fiber: 6g
- **Lunch:** Turkey and Avocado Wrap
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 3 oz turkey slices
    - 1/4 avocado, sliced
    - 1 large lettuce leaf
    - 1/2 cup bell peppers, sliced
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 280
    - Carbohydrates: 15g
    - Fats: 12g
    - Proteins: 25g
    - Fiber: 6g
- **Dinner:** Stir-Fried Tofu with Broccoli and Brown Rice
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 6 oz firm tofu
    - 1 cup broccoli florets
    - 1/2 cup snap peas
    - 1/2 cup cooked brown rice
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 380
    - Carbohydrates: 40g
    - Fats: 15g
    - Proteins: 20g
    - Fiber: 8g
- **Snack:** Carrot sticks with hummus
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 100
    - Carbohydrates: 15g
    - Fats: 4g
    - Proteins: 3g
    - Fiber: 6g

**Day 3:**
- **Breakfast:** Overnight Oats with Sliced Bananas
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 1/2 cup oats
    - 1/2 cup almond milk
    - 1/2 banana, sliced
    - 1 tsp honey
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 280
    - Carbohydrates: 45g
    - Fats: 6g
    - Proteins: 7g
    - Fiber: 6g
- **Lunch:** Quinoa Salad with Black Beans
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 1/2 cup cooked quinoa
    - 1/2 cup black beans
    - 1/4 cup corn
    - 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes
    - 2 tbsp lime-cilantro dressing
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 320
    - Carbohydrates: 50g
    - Fats: 8g
    - Proteins: 12g
    - Fiber: 10g
- **Dinner:** Grilled Shrimp Skewers with Asparagus and Wild Rice
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 6 oz shrimp
    - 1 cup asparagus
    - 1/2 cup cooked wild rice
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 350
    - Carbohydrates: 40g
    - Fats: 5g
    - Proteins: 30g
    - Fiber: 6g
- **Snack:** Rice cakes with 1 tbsp sunflower seed butter
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 150
    - Carbohydrates: 20g
    - Fats: 7g
    - Proteins: 3g
    - Fiber: 2g

**Day 4:**
- **Breakfast:** Spinach Pineapple Smoothie
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 1 cup fresh spinach
    - 1/2 cup pineapple chunks
    - 1 cup coconut milk
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 200
    - Carbohydrates: 25g
    - Fats: 10g
    - Proteins: 2g
    - Fiber: 5g
- **Lunch:** Lentil Soup with Mixed Green Salad
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 1 cup lentil soup
    - 2 cups mixed greens
    - 2 tbsp vinaigrette dressing
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 300
    - Carbohydrates: 35g
    - Fats: 10g
    - Proteins: 15g
    - Fiber: 10g
- **Dinner:** Baked Chicken Breast with Sweet Potatoes and Green Beans
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 4 oz chicken breast
    - 1 medium sweet potato
    - 1 cup green beans
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 380
    - Carbohydrates: 40g
    - Fats: 8g
    - Proteins: 35g
    - Fiber: 10g
- **Snack:** Sliced cucumber with tzatziki sauce
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 80
    - Carbohydrates: 10g
    - Fats: 4g
    - Proteins: 2g
    - Fiber: 2g

**Day 5:**
- **Breakfast:** Avocado Toast with Tomatoes
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 1 slice whole grain toast
    - 1/4 avocado, mashed
    - 1/2 cup cherry tomatoes, sliced
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 220
    - Carbohydrates: 25g
    - Fats: 10g
    - Proteins: 5g
    - Fiber: 6g
- **Lunch:** Grilled Vegetable and Hummus Wrap
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 1 whole wheat wrap
    - 1/2 cup grilled vegetables
    - 2 tbsp hummus
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 280
    - Carbohydrates: 35g
    - Fats: 10g
    - Proteins: 8g
    - Fiber: 9g
- **Dinner:** Beef Stir-Fry with Cauliflower Rice
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 4 oz beef strips
    - 1/2 cup bell peppers
    - 1 cup cauliflower rice
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 350
    - Carbohydrates: 20g
    - Fats: 15g
    - Proteins: 25g
    - Fiber: 5g
- **Snack:** Sliced bell peppers with guacamole
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 120
    - Carbohydrates: 10g
    - Fats: 8g
    - Proteins: 2g
    - Fiber: 4g

**Day 6:**
- **Breakfast:** Cottage Cheese with Peaches and Cinnamon
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 1/2 cup cottage cheese
    - 1 medium peach, sliced
    - 1/2 tsp cinnamon
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 200
    - Carbohydrates: 25g
    - Fats: 5g
    - Proteins: 15g
    - Fiber: 3g
- **Lunch:** Tuna Salad Lettuce Wraps
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 1 can tuna, drained
    - 2 tbsp Greek yogurt
    - 1/4 cup celery, diced
    - Lettuce leaves
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 250
    - Carbohydrates: 5g
    - Fats: 10g
    - Proteins: 30g
    - Fiber: 2g
- **Dinner:** Baked Cod with Sautéed Spinach and Quinoa
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 4 oz cod fillet
    - 1 cup spinach
    - 1/2 cup cooked quinoa
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 320
    - Carbohydrates: 30g
    - Fats: 8g
    - Proteins: 25g
    - Fiber: 5g
- **Snack:** Rice crackers with 1 tbsp pumpkin seed butter
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 150
    - Carbohydrates: 20g
    - Fats: 7g
    - Proteins: 5g
    - Fiber: 3g

**Day 7:**
- **Breakfast:** Chia Seed Pudding with Mixed Berries
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 2 tbsp chia seeds
    - 1/2 cup almond milk
    - 1/2 cup mixed berries
    - 1 tbsp maple syrup
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 220
    - Carbohydrates: 30g
    - Fats: 10g
    - Proteins: 5g
    - Fiber: 10g
- **Lunch:** Chicken and Vegetable Stir-Fry with Brown Rice
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 4 oz chicken breast, sliced
    - 1 cup mixed vegetables
    - 1/2 cup cooked brown rice
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 350
    - Carbohydrates: 40g
    - Fats: 8g
    - Proteins: 30g
    - Fiber: 6g
- **Dinner:** Turkey Meatballs with Zucchini Noodles and Marinara Sauce
  - *Ingredients:* 
    - 4 oz turkey meatballs
    - 1 cup zucchini noodles
    - 1/2 cup marinara sauce
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 320
    - Carbohydrates: 25g
    - Fats: 15g
    - Proteins: 20g
    - Fiber: 5g
- **Snack:** Sliced pear with 1 tbsp sunflower seeds
  - *Nutritional Information:* 
    - Calories: 100
    - Carbohydrates: 20g
    - Fats: 5g
    - Proteins: 2g
    - Fiber: 5g

**Notes:**
- Remember to drink plenty of water throughout the day.
- Be mindful of portion sizes for effective weight loss.
- Include regular physical activity in your routine.
- Feel free to customize the recipes to suit your preferences while maintaining a balance of nutrients.
